name: mistitled
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
having been given a title that is not suitable or correct: The main character in this flagrantly mistitled horror film is not a proper vampire. One journal is mistitled. The concert opened with his amusingly mis-titled work, "Elevator Music". Related word
titled (BOOK/FILM/PAINTING)
More examplesFewer examplesThey said the show was probably the most mistitled sitcom of the decade.The film is a fascinating (if mistitled) look at exploration during this era.This is, in fact, a curiously mistitled and largely disappointing book.This hilariously mis-titled book is unbelievably badly written.
